channel.title: Mods Owners probleM!
channel.description: [b]Ok so i got a privateserver and i got a modernator in it. I hae a great staff zone and now he is mod and i trust him but i want to make Admin+ zone you know where i am going ? Zone where admins and owners can only visit and not mods ok that it easy but the problem is that he can to ::xteleto and ::xteletome and ::Tele then he coud tele to the owners zone can somebody please help me![/b] :confused:

item.title: Mods Owners probleM!
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave() && !p.playerRights < 2) {
                    p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                    p.updateRequired = true;
                    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been teleported to " + playerName);
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
            }
        }[/code][code]if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && playerRights > 0)
{
	try{
	String otherPName = command.substring(8);
	int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
	if(otherPIndex != -1)
		{
		client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if(!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave() && !p.playerRights > 2){
		toX = p.absX;
		toY = p.absY;
		heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
		updateRequired = true;
		sM("Teleto:  to "+p.playerName);
		}
		} 
		}
	catch(Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to.."); }

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Mods Owners probleM!
item.dc:creator: @wartek wartek
item.description:
@wartek wrote:

if (command.startsWith("adminzone") && playerRights == 2) { teleportToX = x-coord; teleportToY = y-coord; sendMessage("Welcome to the admin zone"); }
maybe somethinglike this?
im not sure but i think this will help you
to go there you need do ::adminzone

Read full topic

item.description:

Ok so i got a privateserver and i got a modernator in it. I hae a great staff zone and now he is mod and i trust him but i want to make Admin+ zone you know where i am going ?
